#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(t) scanf("%d",&t);
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("ip.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("op.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif

    priority_queue<int,vector<int> > m,M;

    int n,add,cnt=0,tmp,t,x;
    s(n);

    while(n--)
    {
        s(t);

        if(t==1)
        {
            s(add);
            cnt++;

            if(cnt<=3)
                M.push(add);
            else
            if(-m.top()<=add)
                m.push(-add);
            else
                M.push(add);

            while(m.size()<(cnt/3))
            {
                tmp=M.top();
                M.pop();
                m.push(-tmp);
            }

            while(m.size()>(cnt/3))
            {
                tmp=m.top();
                m.pop();
                M.push(-tmp);
            }
        }
        else
        {
            if((cnt/3)==0)
                printf("No reviews yet\n");
            else
                printf("%d\n",-m.top());
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
